testcase.classname: Partner Organization creation by PM and Rejection by CA
testcase.name: Partner Organization creation by PM and Rejection by BAM:[OrderApproval]
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager[UserInformation]........passed When I go to Organization Page..............................................passed Then I onboard an Organization..............................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Then I launch the application as a BAM......................................passed And I approve the organization..............................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Then I launch the application as a CA.......................................passed And I onhold the organization as CA.........................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager.........................passed And I verify that the organization is onhold................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed
